effect.Name: GIMP Grain Merge (Background)
effect.description: (The effect comes from the GIMP) Grain merge mode merges a grain layer (possibly one created from the "Grain extract" mode) into the current layer, leaving a grainy version of the original layer. It does just the opposite of "Grain extract". It adds the pixel values of the upper and lower layers together and subtracts 0.5.
effect.author: Foxioo
